segments.text: Excuse me. Hi, I'm a professor here. Do you know the Paleontology section, fifth floor, stack 437?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Well, yes! Just give me five minutes, I just have to find someone to cover my shift.
segments.speaker: The Librarian

segments.text: No! No!! No! Can I speak to someone in charge please?!
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Hi, I was wondering if it is possible to increase security in the Paleontology section?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: See I-I wrote a book up there and instead of reading it people are-are-are well, rolling around in front of it.
segments.speaker: Ross
